Name: Doomed'n Damned
About the game: Doomed'n Damned is an action game based on retro/classic platform games from Arcades and 16 bit consoles, but revised to the HD era. The level design, characters, plot and difficulty have a lot of influence from the late 80s and early 90s games. The development and production is by arc-gen, an one man indie game studio. Features: - 16 Bit cheesy sense of humor - Epic boss fighting - Voice over dialogues - Challenging difficulty - Classic level design - Classic weapons and skills - Multiple path levels - Secret items and areas For more information: Twitter: Facebook: Doomed'n Damned website: /
